attributes.action: pursuade Mr Vince Cable to stand for the role of Speaker in the forthcoming election on 22 June.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Vince Cable has consistantly shown throughout this economic crisis that he is the person the media and public turn to when they want information and advice on the economic situation. The public perceive him as a man of great integrity and he is the only person who can bring back the D in democracy to our goverment and restore its shattered reputation. electing Vince Cable would go a huge distance to restoring its pride.
